00037     {
00038         $data = array();
00039         if (strpos($rule_string, "#")) {
00040             $data['comment'] = substr($rule_string, strpos($rule_string, "#") + '1');
00041             $rule_string =  substr($rule_string, '0', strpos($rule_string, "#"));
00042         }
00043 
00044         /*
00045          * Sanitize the rule string so that we can deal with '{foo' as '{ foo' in 
00046          * the code further down without any special treatment
00047          */
00048         $rule_string = preg_replace("/{/", " { ",   $rule_string);
00049         $rule_string = preg_replace("/}/", " } ",   $rule_string);
00050         $rule_string = preg_replace("/\(/", " \( ", $rule_string);
00051         $rule_string = preg_replace("/\)/", " \) ", $rule_string);
00052         $rule_string = preg_replace("/,/", " , ",   $rule_string);
00053         $rule_string = preg_replace("/\"/", " \" ", $rule_string);
00054 
00055         foreach (preg_split("/[\s,\t]+/", $rule_string) as $rule) {
00056             $rules[] = $rule;
00057         }
00058         for ($i = '1'; $i < count($rules); $i++) {
00059             switch ($rules[$i]) {
00060             case "on":
00061                 $data['interface'] = $rules[++$i];
00062                 break;
00063             case "bandwidth":
00064                 $data['bandwidth'] = $rules[++$i];
00065                 break;
00066             case "cbq":
00067             case "priq":
00068             case "hfsc":
00069                 $data['scheduler'] = $rules[$i];
00070                 break;
00071             case "qlimit":
00072                 $data['qlimit'] = $rules[++$i];
00073                 break;
00074             case "tbrsize":
00075                 $data['tbrsize'] = $rules[++$i];
00076                 break;
00077             case "queue":
00078                 $i++;
00079                 if ($rules[$i] != "{") {
00080                     $data['queue'] = $rules[$i];
00081                 } else {
00082                     while (preg_replace("/[\s,]+/", "", $rules[++$i]) != "}") {
00083                         $data['queue'][] = $rules[$i];
00084                     }
00085                 }
00086                 break;
00087             }
00088         }
00089         return $data;
00090     }

00094         $data = "";
00095         if ($this->rules) {
00096             foreach ($this->rules as $rule) {
00097                 if ($rule['type'] == 'comment') {
00098                     $lines = preg_split("/\n/", stripslashes($rule['comment']));
00099                     $data .= "\n";
00100                     foreach ($lines as $line) {
00101                         $data .= "# ". $line. "\n";
00102                     }
00103                     continue;
00104                 }
00105                 $data .= "altq on ". stripslashes($rule['interface']);
00106                 if ($rule['bandwidth']) {
00107                     $data .= " bandwidth ". $rule['bandwidth'];
00108                 }
00109                 if ($rule['scheduler']) {
00110                     $data .= " ". $rule['scheduler'];
00111                 }
00112                 if ($rule['qlimit']) {
00113                     $data .= " qlimit ". $rule['qlimit'];
00114                 }

00116                     $data .= " tbrsize ". $rule['tbrsize'];
00117                 }
00118                 if ($rule['queue']) {
00119                     if (!is_array($rule['queue'])) {
00120                         $data .= " queue ". $rule['queue'];
00121                     } else {
00122                         $data .= " queue { ";
00123                         foreach ($rule['queue'] as $queue) {
00124                             $data .= $queue. ", ";
00125                         }
00126                         $data = rtrim($data, ", ");
00127                         $data .= " }";
00128                     }
00129                 }
00130

00132                     $data .= " # ". trim(stripslashes($rule['comment']));
00133                 }
00134

00136             }
